sqlMap.select:
select fr.FIELD_REQUIRED_ID, fr.REQUIRED as FLD_REQ_REQUIRED, fr.SECTION_NAME as FLD_REQ_SECTION_NAME, fr.SITE_NAME as FLD_REQ_SITE_NAME,
fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, fd.DEFAULT_LABEL as FLD_DEF_DEFAULT_LABEL, fd.ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES as FLD_DEF_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES, fd.ENTITY_TYPE as FLD_DEF_ENTITY_TYPE, fd.FIELD_INFO as FLD_DEF_FIELD_INFO, fd.FIELD_NAME as FLD_DEF_FIELD_NAME, fd.FIELD_TYPE as FLD_DEF_FIELD_TYPE, fd.REFERENCE_TYPE as FLD_DEF_REFERENCE_TYPE, fd.SITE_NAME as FLD_DEF_SITE_NAME,
sfd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, sfd.DEFAULT_LABEL as SECONDARY_DEFAULT_LABEL, sfd.ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES as SECONDARY_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES, sfd.ENTITY_TYPE as SECONDARY_ENTITY_TYPE, sfd.FIELD_INFO as SECONDARY_FIELD_INFO, sfd.FIELD_NAME as SECONDARY_FIELD_NAME, sfd.FIELD_TYPE as SECONDARY_FIELD_TYPE, sfd.REFERENCE_TYPE as SECONDARY_REFERENCE_TYPE, sfd.SITE_NAME as SECONDARY_SITE_NAME
from FIELD_REQUIRED fr inner join FIELD_DEFINITION fd on fr.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION sfd on fr.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = sfd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID
where ((fr.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) or (fr.SITE_NAME is NULL)) and fr.SECTION_NAME = #sectionName# and fr.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinitionId#
and fr.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinitionId#
and fr.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID is NULL
sqlMap.insert: insert into FIELD_REQUIRED (FIELD_REQUIRED_ID, REQUIRED, SECTION_NAME, SITE_NAME, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID) values (#id#, #required#, #sectionName#, #site.name#, #fieldDefinition.id#, #secondaryFieldDefinition.id#)
sqlMap.update: update FIELD_REQUIRED set REQUIRED = #required#, SECTION_NAME = #sectionName#, SITE_NAME = #site.name#, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinition.id#, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinition.id# where FIELD_REQUIRED_ID = #id#
